name: A FRIEND IN THE SCIENCE DEPARTMENT

system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.QA5lS7xT1yU4zV0w]{hit the streets} to look for information about strange or magical phenomena by consulting your university contacts, you can roll with MIND instead of Circle when you consult your contacts at the university.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, your questions attract the attention of an old enemy looking to settle a score.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, they're available and have the stuff. On a 7-9, choose 1:

  • whoever you're going to is juggling their own problems
  • whatever you need is more costly than anticipated

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, they're available and have the stuff.
